website_summaries.verdict: This popular arm cast cover allows you to comfortably protect the full length of your arm while bathing or during other activities.
pros: Built with a gentle arm seal to keep skin feeling comfortable
Durable, thick material lasts for years
Option to purchase in a slimmer or medium fit
cons: A few customers wished it was wider and offered shoulder coverage

customer_reviews.title: Not necessarily "full arm"
customer_reviews.text: This didn't fit on my arm (adult male) when I had a cast that went past my elbow. The opening wasn't nearly wide enough to get around the bend in the cast. We had to buy a leg cover to fit. Once my cast got changed to a smaller one (for broken wrist) this worked fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: As another post mentioned, the greatest thing we hope to never have to use again. At first, I was skeptical because the gasket looked like it was loose fitting. Boy was I surprised! After weeks of showers to cover bandaging from having a plate in the arm, there was never an instance of moisture getting into the cover. A high quality product that saved tons of time over plastic bags and tape.
customer_reviews.author: PryncesPhD

customer_reviews.title: The best and only shower cast cover you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 other covers. All had latex tops and strangled your arm and you had to really fight to get it on. When you have an extremity with pins in it, the last thing you want to do is push a tight rubber ring over it. This is very easy to slip on. Why I like this product—- easy to slide on, no latex! roomy protects from water doesn’t even leave a mark Easy to get off Doesn’t get moldy or stinky
customer_reviews.author: Megt

customer_reviews.title: Works well - instructions could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Even with post surgery swelling, it goes easily over my brace/cast from my hand to bicep. Keeps me totally dry. Not sure instructions are that accurate. You should just roll the rubber seal to the outside (so it doesn't touch your cast at all), slide it on, then roll the seal down. Works great and I can do it without assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: The one time you want to be in limbo!
customer_reviews.text: This is solidly made, I felt secure taking showers wearing it and had no leaks even after several weeks of use. I found that their suggestion of rolling the arm cuff inside out worked quite well for making it easy to get on over a full arm/elbow cast, then you flip it right-side out and you have a good seal. When you're done, roll the cuff down over the plastic and slip the whole thing off...
customer_reviews.author: K. Schafer

customer_reviews.title: May Cost a Bit More, But Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I broke my wrist and was set on making the other areas of my life a little easier. I read all the reviews and didn't pay attention to price. I figured a month of showering with a dry cast was worth every penny. This item was excellent. I never got one drop of water on my arm. I have long hair, that takes a bit to shampoo, this thing held up. My only criticism is that it is very long. Doesn't really matter but a little bulky. Buy this to stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Covers the Subject Quite Well
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect choice when I had surgery on my arm. No leaks and I was able to shower without fear of compromising the site of the incision. The material is very substantial-not cheap and flimsy. It is long enough to cover most of my arm- and I have long arms! I plan to use it again for the upcoming surgery on my other arm.
customer_reviews.author: K. Piner

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé has a wound on his finger that can't get wet and a PICC line in his arm (that also can't get wet). We were bagging it before and using rubber bands. This is MUCH better and easier to use! It's tight at the top but it creates a good seal. Used on a male, 5'10 and about 200lbs. Purchased the adult large.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopping Junkie

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter broke her arm, needed pins and plates. It was going to be awhile. Tried garbage bags, ahh...no. This works great! Kept everything dry, she could get it on and off herself. Well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: scott anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to pull over your cast and it comfortably ...
customer_reviews.text: After struggling with various plastic bags, holding my arm sky high, I am so received to have received this cast cover. After reading other reviews on other items, I chose the Limbo and it works perfectly! Easy enough to pull over your cast and it comfortably seals at the top of your arm to prevent any water flow. The Limbo has made showering so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: G. Janssen

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing! Completely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing! Completely waterproof, even submerged. With a vacation coming up, I started with a waterproof long arm cast. It had to be cut off after less than a week due to compression of the ulnar nerve. I bought this in a pinch to protect my new cast. 100% saved my vacation! And easy to put on and take off myself, with just my good hand. I read so many bad reviews about similar products and took a shot with this one. I couldn’t be happier that I did!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic - well worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic - well worth the $$. You get what you pay for & if you need protection for a cast in the shower, this is the one to get. Easy to put on & off, plenty of room & not one drop of water gets inside of it. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: mnluann

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like it would work but could get it past my elbow. Maybe call it a half arm..
customer_reviews.text: The cast cover seemed great and probably would work great if you did not have a full cast. I could not get the opening around my elbow. Would be great for someone with a smaller arm most likely.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for independence
customer_reviews.text: Have a cast above the elbow, tried garbage bags and tape that failed, this thing made me feel human again! I could shower by myself, including getting it on and off, went to the beach, water parks, pools, not a drop of water got in. I'm 5'8" 165 med build and it fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Eileen McGrogan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for taking a shower with a full arm cast
customer_reviews.text: Had a broken arm in a full cast, Cast cover was very easy to use. No problem slipping over cast. Was able to shower daily and my cast never got wet. Be careful when removing sleeve not to damage seal. Take your time removing sleeve after shower. If I ever needed this product again, I would most certainly buy another. (Let's hope, I don't though)
customer_reviews.author: Alan New York

customer_reviews.title: Don’t cry, keep it dry.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent at protecting your arm. The only drawback is that the elastic hole is about 1 inch to small. I had thumb surgery and could barely get it on. Once on, it really did the job of keeping water out.
customer_reviews.author: His Humble Servant

customer_reviews.title: So worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that I hope I'll never have to use again! As stressful as it was to have a cast so unbearably uncomfortable and itchy, not being able to bathe in a semi-normal fashion might have pushed me over the top. I highly recommend this product, but I hope you never have to use it!
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyFamilyBunches

customer_reviews.title: this works great and is easy to get on and remove
customer_reviews.text: this works great and is easy to get on and remove. very well made and durable. I have used mine after 2 separate surgeries needing to use 2 to 3 weeks for each and it is still like new and works like new. no leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to get on as elastic band is very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Lee G.

customer_reviews.title: The Limbo Cast Protector has made showering so easy and kept my husband's PICC Line Dressing perfectly dry
customer_reviews.text: The Limbo Cast Protector has made showering so easy and kept my husband's PICC Line Dressing perfectly dry. I bought the adult, full arm, for standard builds and it fit my guy who is 2 inches taller and 25 pounds heavier. He has used it for 2 weeks with no problems and he can put it on by himself. I'm not sure it would fit him if he had a cast, but it has been perfect for his needs. It is 100% waterproof and very durable as claimed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the nicest of the cast covers, however ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the nicest of the cast covers,however if you have a long arm these are really short, only 27 inches. I had to get the leg one to cover my full arm above the bicep
customer_reviews.author: IVPC

customer_reviews.title: The quality is excellent, easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: I had a full arm cast due to elbow surgery and this cover exceeded expectations. I'm almost six feet tall and big build, my cast was thick and the cover covered my arm completely. The quality is excellent, easy to put on and take off. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Goes almost up to the shoulder of a 5'9" average size man. It is well made and the cost justifies the ease of taking a shower while recuperating from injuries that need to be kept dry.
customer_reviews.author: Julie J.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Best invention ever when you have broken arm. I didn't need help from others to put it on or take it off. I gained my personal independence with this great shower sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: More for men
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this product as its too hard to pull on an arm that is broken and its too bulky. Probably better suited for a man instead of women.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: i am 6'3,230 lbs and this did not fit. Nearly ripped my dressing off. Just had elbow surgery yesterday and would not fit over wrapped splint. I think I ripped a stitch trying to get rubber past my elbow. Had to cut it off with scissors. Waste of money for me. Might fit a 6 foot tall skin and bones model with a hard cast?
customer_reviews.author: Michael V Ronning

customer_reviews.title: Works well....
customer_reviews.text: Really worked well for my broken hand. Felt like it could have been a little tighter but it really worked so how can I complain? Like no water got in. Just a few drops from sweating etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P. O'connell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. It is thick so I do not worry ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. It is thick so I do not worry about a rip. I am 5'8" and it goes to my armpit. It was needed with the VERY large thick bandage prior to the cast
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: If you need to cover your arm/cast, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! Put it on and forget it. It doesn't leak! It covers your entire arm below your arm pit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Short

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Got it in one day and quickly took a nice DRY shower. Definitely worth the extra money as I didn’t need any help and put it on all by myself!
customer_reviews.author: ValleyBall1

customer_reviews.title: It really works... allowed me to take ...
customer_reviews.text: It really works ... allowed me to take a shower after surgery without getting the bandage wet.
customer_reviews.author: Bob J. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: A little tough to get on but we'll worth it. Kept everything dry.
customer_reviews.author: rlm13

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Life saver, fractured my wrist and this product really helps!
customer_reviews.author: Matin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cast Protector
customer_reviews.text: The waterproof protector was a lifesaver. I was able to take showers and baths without damaging the cast. It was easy to get on and off, easy to dry, and very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenson Pfeiffer Platt

customer_reviews.title: Great for showers only.
customer_reviews.text: Great use for quick shower, but any sort of lengthy exposure to water or submersion and water begins to seep through the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Northey

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the large size for my average size 14yr old and it reaches almost to the arm pit. Works good, has kept the cast dry.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The cast cover was easy to put on and take off. The elastic bank at the top seems thin and not tight, but it never leaked therefore making it more comfortable that others I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Dwinthrop

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Protected my husband's injured arm very well. Easy on/off. Made showering much easier! Well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: He was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this item for my son who had surgery. He was very happy with it. The bandage did not get wet which was very important.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cart

customer_reviews.title: It was easy on and off and no wet cast
customer_reviews.text: my husband is 5'10" medium build and this was a life saver after elbow surgery. He had a cast almost up to his shoulder and it covered it well. It was easy on and off and no wet cast!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Green

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much from this item and it has exceeded my expectations and then some This is a life saver Showers are easier for the wearer and they've even wore it in the rain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, comfortable and had a pocket on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, comfortable and had a pocket on the inside that fits my cell phone or money. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Nichols

customer_reviews.title: It was easy (well, as easy as anything is with one ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a long cast (knuckles to shoulder), this is the cover for you. It was easy (well, as easy as anything is with one hand) to put on and take off by myself, protected my cast from getting wet while I showered, and has a rugged enough construction that I felt confident with it.
customer_reviews.author: Maine Quilter

product_meta.title: Thesis Technology Products Ltd
product_meta.description: Sold by GoBioMed, an Online Medical Supply Superstore. The LimbO Waterproof Cast and Bandage Cover Does Not Leave Your Arm Feeling Strangled!!! Limbo Model M70 Recommended Sizing: Height: 5 foot up - Weight: 154 - 238 pounds. Full Arm Model. The LimbO lets you shower and bathe without the fear of getting your cast or bandage wet. The LimbO is designed to be comfortable and will not restrict the blood flow. We use a gentle wide band of neoprene to create a water tight seal. The competitors products leave your arm feeling strangled like it is in a tourniquet. There is no comparison to the Limbo in either comfort or quality. Specially designed not to restrict blood flow Reduced drag on bandages when fitting and removing Extremely comfortable Durable, should last through treatment 100% Latex free
